amendment.description: Amendment adds a new subsection requiring the commission to consider rules that are limiting or prohibiting government agencies from adopting technology to improve efficiency and effectiveness.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-388 to add a new subsection requiring the commission to consider rules that are limiting or prohibiting government agencies from adopting technology to improve efficiency and effectiveness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Schweikert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
